metadata.description: Planning - Security planning, system documentation - MAPPED

controls.Name: PL-1-description - Policy and Procedures

details: Develop and document planning policy and procedures
Establish planning roles and responsibilities
Define planning processes and workflows
Create planning documentation and templates
Establish policy review and update processes

controls.notes: AWS functions support policy and procedures through planning, compliance monitoring, and access control capabilities

controls.Name: PL-2-description - System Security and Privacy Plans

details: Develop security and privacy plans for the system
Define system components and operational context
Identify system roles and responsibilities
Document security categorization and threats
Review and approve plans by authorizing official

controls.notes: AWS functions support system security and privacy plans through planning, compliance monitoring, and access control capabilities

controls.Name: PL-4-a - Rules of Behavior

details: Establish rules of behavior for system access
Provide rules to individuals requiring access
Receive documented acknowledgment from users
Review and update rules periodically
Require re-acknowledgment when rules change

controls.notes: AWS functions support rules of behavior through planning, compliance monitoring, and access control capabilities

controls.Name: PL-5-description - Privacy Impact Assessment

details: Control has been withdrawn and incorporated into other controls
Refer to the incorporating control for implementation guidance
Ensure compliance through the updated control structure
Document withdrawal and incorporation in planning documents

controls.notes: Control withdrawn and incorporated into other controls. AWS functions support planning through compliance monitoring and access control capabilities.

details: Control has been withdrawn and incorporated into other controls

Ensure compliance through the updated control structure
Document withdrawal and incorporation in planning documents

controls.notes: Control withdrawn and incorporated into other controls. AWS functions support planning through compliance monitoring and access control capabilities.

controls.Name: PL-7-description - Concept of Operations

details: Develop Concept of Operations (CONOPS) for the system
Describe system operation from security and privacy perspective
Review and update CONOPS periodically
Ensure CONOPS consistency with system design
Integrate CONOPS with security and privacy plans

controls.notes: AWS functions support concept of operations through planning, compliance monitoring, and access control capabilities

controls.Name: PL-8-description - Security and Privacy Architectures

details: Develop security and privacy architectures for the system
Describe requirements for protecting confidentiality, integrity, and availability
Describe approach for processing personally identifiable information
Integrate architectures with enterprise architecture
Review and update architectures periodically

controls.notes: AWS functions support security and privacy architectures through planning, compliance monitoring, and access control capabilities

controls.Name: PL-9-description - Central Management

details: Centrally manage organization-defined controls and processes
Implement organization-wide management and implementation
Plan, implement, assess, authorize, and monitor controls
Promote standardization of control implementations
Use automated tools for central management

controls.notes: AWS functions support central management through planning, compliance monitoring, and access control capabilities

controls.Name: PL-10-description - Baseline Selection

details: Select a control baseline for the system
Consider stakeholder needs and mission requirements
Review information types and potential adverse impacts
Analyze system and organizational risk assessments
Document baseline selection rationale

controls.notes: AWS functions support baseline selection through planning, compliance monitoring, and access control capabilities

controls.Name: PL-11-description - Baseline Tailoring

details: Tailor the selected control baseline
Apply specified tailoring actions
Identify and designate common controls
Apply scoping considerations and compensating controls
Assign values to control parameters

controls.notes: AWS functions support baseline tailoring through planning, compliance monitoring, and access control capabilities
